title: Curio Store, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LRC, in negative: [77 Curio Store]
description: five figures inside an open-fronted room on stilts; girl at right sits behind bowls, trays, boxes and various objects; older man at center; seated woman wearing grey and blue striped kimono at right; two figures in background
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
